mapper.insert: insert into topic(topicid , usersid , filmid , num , contents , addtime ) values(#{topicid} , #{usersid} , #{filmid} , #{num} , #{contents} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update topic set usersid=#{usersid} , filmid=#{filmid} , num=#{num} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} where topicid=#{topicid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.bookname from topic a , users b , book c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.filmid = c.bookid order by topicid desc
select a.* , b.username , c.bookname from topic a , users b , book c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.filmid = c.bookid and topicid=#{topicid} order by topicid desc
